form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Oath or Affirmation of Deponent, FOIA ( (b)(6)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/17/2023 I have stocks and bonds with the following market value, as indicated on the attached list which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. $ FOIA (b)(6) I have life insurance in the sum of $ With a cash surrender value of $ I own real estate valued at $ With mortgages or other encumbrances thereon amounting to $ - Which is located at N.A (Street and Number (City) (State) (Zip Code) 8. That the following persons are dependent upon me for support: (Place an "X" in the appropriate column to indicate whether the person named is wholly or partially dependent upon you for support.) Name of Person Wholly Dependent Partially Dependent Age Relationship to Me MUZAFFAR KHAN RAJA X 90 Father MAKBER JAN RAJA 76 Mother FOIA (b)(6) 9. That I have previously submitted affidavit(s) of support for the following person(s). If none, state "None" Name Date submitted FOIA (b)(6) 10. That I have submitted visa petition(s) to the Immigration and Naturalization Service on behalf of the following person(s). If none, state none. Name Relationship Date submitted FOIA (b)(6) 11.(Complete this DLOCK only if the person namea in item 3 will be in the Unitea States temporarily.) That I do intend do not intend, to make specific contributions to the support of the person named in item 3. (If you check "do intend", indicate the exact nature and duration of the contributions. For example, if you intend to furnish room and board, state for how long and, if money, state the amount in United States dollars and state whether it is to be given in a lump sum, weekly, or monthly, or for how long.) DOROTHY A. BRACKETT Comm. # 964280 NOTARY PUBLIC CALIFORNIA SANTA CLARA COUNTY OATH OR AFFIRMATION OF DEPONENT My Commission Expires April 12, 1996 I acknowledge at that I have read Part III of the Instructions, Sponsor and Alien Liability, and am aware of my responsibilitiesas an immigrant sponsor under the Social Security Act, as amended, and the Food Stamp Act, as amended. I swear (affirm) that I know the contents of this affidavit signed hv me and the statements are true and correct. Signature of deponent FOIA (b)(6) Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me this 8th day of November 19 93 at Santa Clara, CA U.S.A My commission expires on 4-12-96 Signature of Officer Administering Oath Dorothya Brocket Title notary Public If affidavit prepared by other than deponent, please complete the following: I declare that this document was prepared by me at the request of the deponent and is based on all information of which I have knowledge. (Signature) (Address) (Date)
